tasks.label: Make Migrations
tasks.command: read -r; eval $REPLY; DEBUG=True python manage.py makemigrations

tasks.label: Migrate
tasks.command: read -r; eval $REPLY; DEBUG=True python manage.py migrate

tasks.label: Make Messages
tasks.command: read -r; eval $REPLY; DEBUG=True python manage.py makemessages -a

tasks.label: Compile Messages
tasks.command: read -r; eval $REPLY; DEBUG=True python manage.py compilemessages

tasks.label: Collect Static
tasks.command: read -r; eval $REPLY; DEBUG=True python manage.py collectstatic
